com.jackrl.bomberguygame.domain

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jackrl.bomberguygame.domain.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Block, Bomb, Enemy, Player, Wall

    public abstract class Entity
extends Object

    An abstract class for all the entities that are rendered in the game.
